name: Reaction Time Test!
description:
- Are you confident about your reflexes?
”Spark” is a "simple", "fun", "addictive" game that tests your reflexes!
It's perfect for testing, training, and competing reflexes with players around the globe.
You can play some of the most popular reflexes games that you must have seen before for absolutely free!
Play all 5 reflexes games!

= How to play =
- Numbers： tap on the randomly placed tiles in order!
- Arrows： flick to the direction of arrow as fast as you can!
- Flash： tap the yellow ball as soon as it appears on the screen!
- Beat： follow and tap on the pink ball that run across the screen!
- Tile： tap all red flashing tiles in order!

You can test yourself on mastering one game or you can enjoy playing all reflexes games just for fun.

- Featuring "Stats View" function!
You can see high scores and leaderboards for each 5 reflexes games.
Players around the world are challenging their reflexes.
Also, players can easily share their stats of reflexes games to friends over the SNS using share functionality.
